response.original_title: Haken - Liveforms: An Evening with Haken
response.overview: Progressive pioneers Haken spent 2024 celebrating their most recent acclaimed studio album, ‘Fauna’, in the most comprehensive way possible, as part of their ‘An Evening With’ run throughout the world. Playing two full sets each night, the band performed ‘Fauna’ in full, before returning to the stage to run through a selection of the best-loved cuts from their catalogue. In a homecoming of sorts for Haken, on the 21st September 2024 the band played London’s legendary O2 Forum, and the document of that special evening is what’s witnessed on ‘Liveforms: An Evening With Haken’.  1. The Last Lullaby 2. Taurus 3. Nightingale 4. The Alphabet Of Me 5. Sempiternal Things 6. Beneath The White Rainbow 7. Islands In The Clouds 8. Lovebite 9. Elephants Never Forget 10. Eyes Of Ebony 11. Crystallised 12. Puzzle Box 13. Earthrise 14. Cochroach King 15. Nil By Mouth 16. 1985 17. The Strain 18. Strainwreck 19. Canary Yellow 20. Drowning In The Flood 21. Visions
response.title: Haken - Liveforms: An Evening with Haken
